Package src.main.java.models

Class WeeklyReviewByRevenueModel

java.lang.Object
src.main.java.models.RevenueCalculationModel
src.main.java.models.WeeklyReviewByRevenueModel
Direct Known Subclasses:
AnnualForecastGrossProfitModel, WeeklyReviewByRevenueAndBackordersModel
public class WeeklyReviewByRevenueModel
extends RevenueCalculationModel
The WeeklyReviewByRevenueModel class represents a data model for function_B - the weekly review by revenue calculation that is used in Function B GUI /resource/frontend/weeklyReviewByRevenue.fxml. It extends the RevenueCalculationModel class.
Version:
Java15
Author:
LUK, Chun San Marco, Github id: csluk2001

      public OptimalSalesRevenueModel calculateOptimalProductionValue()

    • calculateLabourAndGrapeSurplus

      public int[] calculateLabourAndGrapeSurplus​(int optRose, int optNoir)
      Calculates the labour and grape surplus for the given optimal Rose and Noir production values.
      Parameters:
      optRose - Optimal litres of Rose production value.
      optNoir - Optimal litres of Noir production value.
      Returns:
      An int array containing the labour and grape surplus.

    • wineProductionCapacityOverloadedOnGrape

      public boolean wineProductionCapacityOverloadedOnGrape​(int optRose, int optNoir)
      Checks if the production capacity is overloaded on grape for the given actual optimal Rose and Noir production values.
      Parameters:
      optRose - Optimal litres of Rose production value.
      optNoir - Optimal litres of Noir production value.
      Returns:
      True if the production capacity is overloaded on grape, false otherwise.

    • grapeResourceUtilizationIsInsufficientDueToInsufficientLabourSupplied

      public boolean grapeResourceUtilizationIsInsufficientDueToInsufficientLabourSupplied​(int optRose, int optNoir, int capGrape)
      Checks if the grape resource utilization is insufficient due to insufficient labour supply for the given optimal Rose and Noir production values.
      Parameters:
      optRose - Optimal litres of Rose production value.
      optNoir - Optimal litres of Noir production value.
      capGrape - Capacity of Grape.
      Returns:
      True if the actual consumption of grape is lower than the grape provided in that week, false otherwise.
